channel.title: Deprecated error on forums can anyone help?
channel.description: ERROR MESSAGE I GET: Deprecated: Function set_magic_quotes_runtime() is deprecated in C:\wamp\www\include\base.php on line 23 . I tried replacing the base.php file but i still get the same error, here is what my file looks like: [IMG]http://i696.photobucket.com/albums/vv328/insanepk/aaa.jpg[/img]

item.title: Deprecated error on forums can anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

[quote=“Trax88, post:12, topic:307060”][quote author=z2 link=topic=403210.msg3134814#msg3134814 date=1266852241]

It’s only deprecated because magic quotes is being removed from PHP. As long as it’s disabled in your php.ini (and you should be shot if it isn’t) - you can just comment the line out.

like KO9 said, you should be shot.

Yeah sorry, that i didnt got it last time. I got it work now, but only thing is, it testroying template. Is there other way, so it wount harm it?

All you have to do is go into the file, find the line to where its located, at the BEGINNING of the line put // and it will comment the line out of the page. This will get rid of your error the easy way.
[/quote]
i did it already, and worked, but its ruined template. Is there way to fix template? its probaly needs that line. in case it wasnt there just for nothing.[/quote]
Removing just the line mentioned will not affect any of your other files or the operation of the site, apart from removing any deprecation warning. You changed something else. I would suggest restoring the default files.

Read full topic
item.source: Deprecated error on forums can anyone help?
